docs.title: 导出PDF
docs.text:
• https://doc.courtbouillon.org/weasyprint/stable/first_steps.html#macos
brew install pango libffi
brew install glib
brew link glib

brew install weasyprint
  • fix: https://github.com/Kozea/WeasyPrint/issues/1448
sudo ln -s /opt/homebrew/opt/glib/lib/libgobject-2.0.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/gobject-2.0
sudo ln -s /opt/homebrew/opt/pango/lib/libpango-1.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/pango-1.0
sudo ln -s /opt/homebrew/opt/harfbuzz/lib/libharfbuzz.dylib /usr/local/lib/harfbuzz
sudo ln -s /opt/homebrew/opt/fontconfig/lib/libfontconfig.1.dylib /usr/local/lib/fontconfig-1
sudo ln -s /opt/homebrew/opt/pango/lib/libpangoft2-1.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/pangoft2-1.0

docs.title: 网格
docs.text:
• https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/grids/#using-generic-grids-unordered-list
  • HTML for content and structure
  • JavaScript for interactivity
  • CSS for text running out of boxes
  • Internet Explorer … huh?
  • 示例2
Unordered listOrdered list
  • Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
  • Donec vitae suscipit est
  • Nulla tempor lobortis orci
  1. Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
  2. Donec vitae suscipit est
  3. Nulla tempor lobortis orci
Content tabs
=== "Unordered list"

    * Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
    * Donec vitae suscipit est
    * Nulla tempor lobortis orci

=== "Ordered list"

    1. Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
    2. Donec vitae suscipit est
    3. Nulla tempor lobortis orci

  • This was inserted (underline)

键盘按键:

Ctrl+Alt+Del

docs.title: 选项卡
docs.text:
• https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/content-tabs/#usage
CC++ 
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
  printf("Hello world!\n");
  return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

int main(void) {
  std::cout << "Hello world!" << std::endl;
  return 0;
}
